title: Toxic Clans
body:
I thought this might be a good place to vent. I doubt anything will come of it but whatever.
If my account get's suspended or BANNED god forbid I'm going to be seriously hurt. (I have no idea how the reporting system works so rip)

Okay, so let's see.
Having 6300+ ip earlier I decided to buy Kindred, because they're a champion I've never had the pleasure of playing.
Going into the norms match queue, of course I wanted to play them, so I instantly called ADC once a match was found and low and behold, somebody else called adc a second afterward.

This guy instalocked Jinx, demanding he got adc first, and so I asked our other team-mates who called adc first. (since theres been instances before where it shows up differently on your screen and all that)
One guy says Jinx, another me.
Instantly after the guy said me he revoked his statement and said Jinx which I found fishy but whatever.

Heres my first fuckup. I went Kindred regardless and just stated I was going support. (YES, I know, bad move but I knew we could win)

In the loading screen, GUESS WHAT, all four teammembers were in a clan. How lucky for Jinx. She had friends to back her up.
Okay, in game, Jinx bit at me a few times at the start however it all went somewhat smoothly until near the end of the game when we were losing pretty heavily because our mid fed the opposing Aurelion earlier. 

Both the Jinx and our naut started saying in all chat "REPORT KINDRED, SO TOXIC" "KINDRED TOLD US TO KILL OURSELVES"
They just started saying all of this incorrect bull about me when I hadn't even been talking to them about anything other then what I was going to do. (like warding)
They told the other team all of this WHILE telling ME to kill myself, and that our loss was my fault, and mine alone when, I went 4/4 and every other team mate went negative. //ugh

I don't deny in any way I could have played better, and made better choices in and out of game.
But, I just don't react well at all to being ganged up on. And I didn't at all try to hurt them in any way shape or form. But clearly they tried to hurt me.
(and I don't react at all well to people telling me what to do, but thats just a personality thing)

Anyone else been ganged up on like this? Also, if four people report you in one game can that be enough to get your accounted suspended or worse?
I don't believe I've been reported before, this is my first experience with people like these it's insane

replies.body: Don't feel too bad, I once had all 4 of my team (a premade before clubs) go afk except one who stayed to make sure they all came back at the end and not get reported, it was a good 1v5 game. I likely got reported by all 4 of them luckily nothing came of it.

That kind of reminds me of a similar game when I had just started playing, where all 4 of my teammates left.
I ended up playing the best I could regardless and the enemy team was really nice LOL
I friended a lot of them afterward and I play with them to this day

So, good things come out of bad experiences I suppose

the enemy team was quite nice about it too for me, and said they would help report them after 10 minutes of them being afk, but then proceeded to believe everything negative they said about me when they came back and I doubt they reported, and quite probably reported me. (hence why they came back to avoid reports)

If you weren't doing anything wrong, there shouldn't be anything in your chat logs that could get you punished. Hopefully you did the right thing at the end go the game and reported these players. Trying to solicit fake reports is a punishable offence.

^^^

If you want a bit of insight into how the system works, I'll grab a few links for you

[PLAYER BEHAVIOUR FAQ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/L65wrRYe-player-behaviour-faq-updated-for-instant-feedback)
[HOW DO REPORTS WORK](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/reports-how-do-they-work)
[REPORTABLE BEHAVIOUR](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player#h1q1)
[NOT REPORTABLE BEHAVIOUR](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player#h2q1)

Thank you for the info! ^~^
It helped me get a better understanding of it all, and I assume I should be perfectly fine

Yep, you can bet I reported them c':
I went and read about the reporting system, so yeah, I assume I'll be fine! Thanks~
